DocumentFragmentChildren.summary:
The read-only children property returns a live
which contains all of the child of the document fragment upon which it was called.
DocumentFragmentChildren.value:
An which is a live, ordered collection of the DOM
elements which are children of the document fragment. You can access the
individual child nodes in the collection by using either the
method on the collection, or by using
JavaScript array-style notation.If the document fragment has no element children, then children is an empty list with a
length of 0.
